mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_CSR_BASIC( CP_CODE, CSR_TYPE, CSR_IDENTIFER, CSR_CODE, REG_ADDRESS, OFFICE_ADDRESS, CSR_OWNER, FINANCE_LEADER, TAX_LEADER, OPERATOR, REMARK, CSR_NAME ) VALUES( #{cpCode}, #{csrType}, #{csrIdentifer}, #{csrCode}, #{regAddress}, #{officeAddress}, #{csrOwner}, #{financeLeader}, #{taxLeader}, #{operator}, #{remark}, #{csrName} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, CSR_TYPE as csrType, CSR_IDENTIFER as csrIdentifer, CSR_CODE as csrCode, REG_ADDRESS as regAddress, OFFICE_ADDRESS as officeAddress, CSR_OWNER as csrOwner, FINANCE_LEADER as financeLeader, TAX_LEADER as taxLeader, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark, CSR_NAME as csrName FROM AT_CSR_BASIC WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT b.ID as id, b.CP_CODE as cpCode, b.CSR_TYPE as csrType, b.CSR_IDENTIFER as csrIdentifer, b.CSR_CODE as csrCode, b.REG_ADDRESS as regAddress, b.OFFICE_ADDRESS as officeAddress, b.CSR_OWNER as csrOwner, b.FINANCE_LEADER as financeLeader, b.TAX_LEADER as taxLeader, b.OPERATOR as operator, b.CREATE_TIME as createTime, b.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, b.REMARK as remark, CSR_NAME as csrName FROM AT_CSR_BASIC b WHERE b.ID = #{id}

SELECT ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, CSR_TYPE as csrType, CSR_IDENTIFER as csrIdentifer, CSR_CODE as csrCode, REG_ADDRESS as regAddress, OFFICE_ADDRESS as officeAddress, CSR_OWNER as csrOwner, FINANCE_LEADER as financeLeader, TAX_LEADER as taxLeader, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark, CSR_NAME as csrName FROM AT_CSR_BASIC WHERE CSR_TYPE = 3 and CP_CODE= ( SELECT CP_CODE FROM AT_USER WHERE ID = #{userId} ) limit #{page.pageSize} offset #{page.offset}
SELECT count(*) FROM AT_CSR_BASIC WHERE CSR_TYPE = 3 and CP_CODE= ( SELECT CP_CODE FROM AT_USER WHERE ID = #{userId} )

SELECT ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, CSR_TYPE as csrType, CSR_IDENTIFER as csrIdentifer, CSR_CODE as csrCode, REG_ADDRESS as regAddress, OFFICE_ADDRESS as officeAddress, CSR_OWNER as csrOwner, FINANCE_LEADER as financeLeader, TAX_LEADER as taxLeader, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark, CSR_NAME as csrName FROM AT_CSR_BASIC WHERE 1 = 1 and CSR_IDENTIFER = #{csrIdentifer}
